project.name: C-C129A-WIRE-02-ST03-DT07-DF17-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C129A-WIRE-02-ST03-DT07-DF17-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good input:1) environment variable contains only alphanumeric charactersBad input:1) environment variable contains * or -. + causes infinte loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="exampleofgoodinput" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
